Hey #rstats I've uploaded all code for my maps/spatial projects this month. Covers shp/raster, ggplot & text layout, mapdeck, leaflet etc + tips/hacks #rspatial  

+ any #30DayMapChallenge peeps wanting to learn mapping in R, I got you ‚¨áÔ∏è

https://t.co/Su8Y89AbUY https://t.co/Rtxy1Cp6gL

I've just reviewed the most open-sciency Comm & #ica21 paper ever:

- Data shared
- Power-analysis based on SESOI
- Preregistered
- Shared #rstats & #rmarkdown code

Plus: 
- Separation of within & between effects
- Multi-level modeling
- Assumptions tested

Wow. Truly impressed.
